text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro! Welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies!

I got so many requests from you guys to make
something Steven Universe

themed, and I thought, hmm, what should I
make?

I’ve been watching some of the older episodes,
specifically season 1,

episode 4, where Steven makes the Together
Breakfast and I thought,

we gotta do that! But we’re gonna do it
with a twist, because on Reddit
I saw these awesome Donut Waffles.

So today, we are gonna be making the Together
Breakfast from Steven Universe
with a twist, let’s get started!

The things you will need, will be: Some original
glazed donuts, I’m gonna be

using some from Krispy Kreme, because I love them!
Look at those guys!
They’re so good!

Maple Syrup, some popcorn, you can use whatever
type of popcorn you like.

A waffle maker, whipped cream and some fresh
strawberries.
Now let’s put it all together!

The first thing that you’re gonna do is
make some popcorn.

I’ve got microwaveable popcorn so it’s
super easy, you just open it up.

And some microwaveable popcorns, they want
to be sitting on a certain side,

so just follow the instructions and we’re
gonna pop it in the microwave
for 2-1/2 minutes.

Popcorn just came out of the microwave, be
careful, it’s hot!
Mmmmmm! And it smells so good!
Give it a little shake.

I don’t know if this is an actual instruction
but I do it.

And then I’m just gonna pour some into a
little bowl and then set it off to the side,
while we make our waffles. Our donut waffles!
Ooooh-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
Yes!

Over here I’ve plugged in our waffle maker
and it’s heating up, I have it
set to the lowest setting, so the lowest temperature.

So you’re gonna open him up, put the donut
in the center and then we’re gonna
close down, and squish ‘em!
It’s gonna sit here for about 1 minute.

This is a good time to do squats. Right here,
so I can eat more donuts.
And you have to do 100 squats, work the booties!

Cassey taught me these, she don’t mess around,
she does a 6 minute buns,
6 minute abs, I only got 1 minute!
OK, 1 minutes up, whew! Thank goodness!
I earned this donut, didn’t I? OK!

So you’re gonna open this, oh look at that!
It looks just like a waffle!

You’re gonna pick him up, be gentle, and
plop him onto a plate.

Now you can make as many as you’d like,
it’s a big stack of waffles.

Now we’re gonna add all of our toppings, the first
thing that we’re gonna add is our

maple syrup, and it's just a little bit, it isn’t
very much.

Then he puts on some popcorn, we’re gonna
make it rain.
Make it rain! Here we go!

Oooh! Now this is fun! You’re gonna make
a little whoop! A little tower of
whipped cream at the top, here we go.
Perfect!

And now, last but not least, you’re gonna
add one strawberry right on top, and

you have many to choose from over here. So
I’m gonna pick the pretty one.
And, Steven always takes his time.
Hmmm, hmmm, hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm…
Boom!
Huh, it’s done!

Ta-da! Here is the Together Breakfast that
we made today!

Thanks you guys for suggesting something from
Steven Universe!

This was so much fun to make, and, we did
it with a twist!

And instead of your regular waffles, we made donut
waffles, because they are
delicious and awesome! So, thanks you guys!

I will be posting lots of pictures of this
on Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and

Instagram, and if you guys make this, breakfast
or any

Steven Universe Together Breakfast, please
take a picture and send it to me!

I love seeing your baking creations, I just
get a big kick out of it!
It makes my day!
Alright, thanks again you guys, bye-bye!
